UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Probing the role of Proline in the antimicrobial activity and lipopolysaccharide binding of indolicidin.
Literature.Author: Bera S, Ghosh A, Sharma S, Debnath T, Giri B, Bhunia A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=15µM),Salmonella typhimurium(MIC=25µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=100µM)
